review: Compared to purple product - I found the controller to be less sturdy and seemingly "cheaper".  I was disappointed in that I could not find some of the apps to which I had become accustomed on the purple competitor.  Font size in menus was difficult to read from a distance at which most large screen TVs are viewed. Basically, I found nothing advantageous to this stick versus the purple competitor.
author: steven c. martz
